title: Edge Definition v1
description: Schema for campaign edge definitions connecting entities within a package

stable_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this edge

type.description: Edge relationship type as defined in the taxonomy

src_ref.description: Stable ID of the source entity

dst_ref.description: Stable ID of the destination entity

attributes.description: Edge-specific attributes required by the taxonomy

annotations.description: Optional free-form annotations for analytics or tooling

validity.description: Temporal validity metadata for this edge

start_event_id.description: Event ID that establishes when the edge becomes valid

end_event_id.description: Event ID when the edge stops being valid; null for open-ended
